title: Orange peel biochar/clay/titania composites: low cost, high performance, and easy-to-reuse photocatalysts for the degradation of tetracycline in water
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, 10,1432-1450
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00037D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Morenike O. Adesina, Moses O. Alfred, Harald Seitz, Katlen Brennenstuhl, Harshadrai M. Rawel, Pablo Wessig, Jiyong Kim, Armin Wedel, Wouter Koopman, Christina Günter, Emmanuel I. Unuabonah, Andreas Taubert
New orange peel biochar/clay/titania nanocomposites (NCs) effectively degrade tetracycline under both UV and natural solar irradiation.
